scripts.install-client: npm --prefix client install || echo 'No package.json in client'
scripts.install-server: npm --prefix server install || echo 'No package.json in server'
scripts.install-server-pip: pip install -r server/install.txt || echo 'No install.txt in server'
scripts.install-app: npm run install-client && (npm run install-server) && install-server-pip
